formulas.name: f_LastDayOfMonth
formulas.expression: IF( MONTH( TODAY() ) = 12, DATE( YEAR( TODAY() ), 12, 31), DATE( YEAR( TODAY() ), MONTH( TODAY() ) +1, 1) -1)

fields.name: sellingMotionChoices
fields.fieldText: What kind of change do you want to make to this contract?

fields.name: assetQuoteLineNote
fields.fieldText: ﻿Previously selected Asset will be brought forward as a Quote Line.

fields.name: addOnQuoteLineNote
fields.fieldText: ﻿Previously selected Asset will not be brought forward as a Quote Line.

screens.description: Screen for selecting the start date of the amendment or cancellation.
screens.name: New_Quote_Screen
screens.label: New Quote Screen

fields.name: Date_Selector_Screen_Header
fields.fieldText: New Quote

fields.name: Selected_Start_Date
fields.helpText: You will be able to edit the {!lowercase_actionTypeNoun} dates for each individual asset once you enter the {!outputType}.

validationRule.errorMessage: Provide a date of today or a date in the future but, before Contract End Date ({!Get_Contract_Record.EndDate}).
Valid Through Date cannot be earlier than today.

fields.name: Toggle_Note
fields.fieldText: Note: The Syncing toggle represents the primary Quote that will sync to the Opportunity. If toggled to Active, this Quote will be used to calculate the Opportunity Amount. Only one Quote can be synced with the Opportunity at any given time.

fields.name: Oppty_Choices
fields.fieldText: Would you like a New Opportunity created for you, or is there an Open Opportunity that you would like to use?

fields.name: QuotingMaintenanceText
fields.fieldText:
Quoting is currently unavailable due to scheduled maintenance. Quotes cannot be created, modified, or submitted for approvals while maintenance is underway. Please check back later.


For more information see the #broadcast-revenue-eops-comms in Slack.

variables.description: Indicates which of the Amend, Renew, or Cancel Invocable Actions to invoke
variables.name: actionType

variables.description: Noun tense of actionType (e.g., if actionType is "Amend", then actionTypeNoun will be"Amendment")
variables.name: actionTypeNoun

variables.description: The type of record to be created as part of this operation. Supported values are Order and Quote.
variables.name: outputType

variables.description: The quantity to add to or reduce from the asset's existing quantity
variables.name: quantityChange

variables.description: The asset IDs that are passed in as input to the flow
variables.name: recordIds

variables.description: The effective date for the new amendment/cancellation order/quote
variables.name: startDate

variables.description: The incoming record ID. Supported values are Order ID and Quote ID.
variables.name: transactionId
